item.title: Wahl Pet Friendly Waterless No Rinse Shampoo for Animals – Lavender & Chamomile for Cleaning, Conditioning, Detangling, & Moisturizing Dogs, Cats, & Horses – 7.1 Oz – Model 820014A

Our waterless shampoo moisturizes hair by penetrating & sealing in natural sugars & proteins. The lavender chamomile fragrance is designed to give your pet a fresh and clean smell without ... item.content:encoded:
Price: $7.99 - $5.98
(as of Nov 30,2022 05:53:50 UTC – Details)


The Wahl waterless, no rinse lavender & chamomile shampoo is great for shampooing between baths. Formulated with all-natural plant-based cleansers. Our waterless shampoo moisturizes hair by penetrating & sealing in natural sugars & proteins. The lavender chamomile fragrance is designed to give your pet a fresh and clean smell without having to give them a full bath. Our plant derived cleanses make our waterless shampoos the choice for owners who want to avoid harsh chemicals for their dogs and themselves. Our shampoos are PEG-80 free, alcohol free, paraben free, and pH balanced. Wahl has been serving professional vets and groomers for over 50 years. We are a company of animal lovers that want the best for your family member.
Is Discontinued By Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ No
Product Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 1.98 x 1.98 x 7.8 inches; 7.1 Ounces
Item model number ‏ : ‎ 820014
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ January 1, 2013
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ Wahl Clipper Corp.
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B00GZQYK4K
Country of Origin ‏ : ‎ USA

No Rinsing Necessary – For dogs, cats, horses, or other animals that don’t like wet shampoos; no rinsing necessary, simply dry with a towel & brush coat
Calming Formula – This plant derived lavender & chamomile scented waterless shampoo is great for cleansing, conditioning, detangling, & moisturizing animals; our calming formula settles restless animals during cleaning.
Safe Usage Instructions – Although a hypoallergenic formula, we advise testing a small amount for your pets first time and dry thoroughly to make sure your pet tolerates the cleansing agents
The Brand Used by Professionals – Wahl has been serving professional vets and groomers for over 50 years. clean, condition fur & hair for a smooth, soft coat. We are a company of animal lovers that want the best for your family member

Large Dual Level Slicker
Dual Pin Brush
Flea Finishing Comb
Double Sided Shedding Blade
Pet Nail Clippers
Function Protects Skin & Removes Loose Hair Multi-Head Pin Brush Stimulates & Shines Coat Flea, Hair Pick, & Finishing Comb Effortlessly Removes Loose Fur From Coat Easily & Safely Trim Your Pets Nails
Main Benefits Large head size that is able to easily cover large sections of hair. Dual level pins safely remove hair from the upper and lower coat while protecting the skin. Large head size that easily covers large sections of hair. Dual level pins safely remove hair from the upper and lower coat while protecting the skin. Bristles shine the coat during brushing. The double sided dual head is designed for multiple uses. Multi level pins detangle and remove dead fur. Flea & tick comb removes flea eggs and ticks from beneath your pets coat. Shedding blade is double sided, one side is course and the other is fine. The blade separates at the handle which allows the blade area to expand by double to cover large and small areas. Stainless steel blades provide a clean cut every time, dull blades can be dangerous and harm your pet. Safety lock for avoiding accidents and allows for easy storage.
